item.description:

âRuth Scriptâ is a beautiful hand-lettered script intended for chain stitch embroidery layouts. The font is inspired by the âArtistic Scriptâ alphabet designed by Ruth Franklin.

Purchasing directly supports the cost of hosting this website as well as the many hours that went into making the font available from Ruth’s original material.

If you prefer to layout your designs by hand without the help of a font, you can reference the scanned version in The Lettering Book on page 94. I’ve also designed a digital poster that can be printed at scale or imported into procreate/photoshop/illustrator. You can download it for free here.

Ruth’s original alphabet included Upper and Lowercase characters only. This font set includes additional number characters, punctuation and common symbols.

Because the original letters was designed to be used in hand-drawn layouts, the letters were outline only. This font includes a filled version for more versatility.
